LanguageData.PlantRadish.label: Radish plant
LanguageData.PlantRadish.description: Radishes grow fast but harvest number is few.
LanguageData.PlantMugwort.label: Mugwort plant
LanguageData.PlantMugwort.description: Mugwort grows slowly but harvest number is large.
LanguageData.PlantCabbage.label: Cabbage plant
LanguageData.PlantCabbage.description: Cabbage grows fast but there is little to harvest.
LanguageData.PlantLettuce.label: Lettuce
LanguageData.PlantLettuce.description: Lettuce grows slowly but there is much to harvest.
LanguageData.PlantCarrot.label: Carrot
LanguageData.PlantCarrot.description: Carrots grow slowly but there is much to harvest.
LanguageData.PlantSweetpepper.label: Sweetpepper plant
LanguageData.PlantSweetpepper.description: Sweetpepper grows fast but harvest number is few.
LanguageData.PlantPumpkin.label: Pumpkin plant
LanguageData.PlantPumpkin.description: Pumpkin is one of the best vegetable in rimworld. It is difficult to grow, but has a lot of benefits.
